scenario_description: A customer service representative's short reply to a customer's inquiry about their shipping status.

messages.content: Customer: Hi, I'd like to know if my order has been shipped. My order number is #123456.

Hi, thank you for contacting us. I have checked your order status and your order has been shipped today. You can track your order using this link: https://example.com/track-order. I hope you enjoy your purchase and we appreciate your business. Have a great day!
Customer: Understood, thank you. Can I reach out to you again if I have more questions?
Hi, I'm Customer Service. You can reach out to me anytime with your questions. Have a great day!
